data.title: Watch: Oh My Girl Drops MV For Surprise Single "Miracle" In Celebration Of 8th Anniversary
data.meta_description: Oh My Girl has a surprise gift for their fans to celebrate their 8th debut anniversary! data.text:
Oh My Girl has a surprise gift for their fans to celebrate their 8th debut anniversary!

On April 22 at 4 p.m. KST, Oh My Girl dropped a surprise new single “Miracle” along with the music video for the track.

The single is released to celebrate the group’s 8th debut anniversary and will mark the first song by Oh My Girl in which all six members Hyojung, Mimi, YooA, Seunghee, Yoo Bin (formerly known as Binnie), and Arin participated in writing the lyrics of. “Miracle,” which is also Oh My Girl’s official fan club name, contains the members’ gratitude through sincere lyrics dedicated to their fans who have given Oh My Girl genuine support and love for the past eight years.

Check out the music video below!

Oh My Girl made their debut in 2015 and has released numerous hits including “Dun Dun Dance,” “Dolphin,” “Nonstop,” and “Secret Garden.” On May 2022, WM Entertainment announced that Jiho had parted ways with the agency and Oh My Girl. Following the news, Jiho shared a handwritten letter to fans.

Watch Seunghee in “Oasis” below:

Watch Now

What are Cookies?

When you visit any web site, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalised web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.

Always on

Site Functionality Cookies

We use cookies to provide you with the features and intended user experience of the Sites (e.g. these cookies can help Us with keeping track of user preferences). We use cookies to enable our security features and to help Us detect activities that violate our policies (e.g. these cookies can help Us prevent spam). We use cookies to verify your account and personalize your experience (e.g. these cookies can help Us keep you logged in as you navigate between Site pages).

Performance, Analytics and Research

We use cookies to collect information on how the Sites are used and to report on the Sites usage statistics for the improvement of Our services (e.g. these cookies can help Us count visits, page views, traffic sources, and better understand how you and other users use Our Sites, and identify features that could be improved).

Social Media

We use cookies that are set by a range of social media services that We have added to Our Sites to enable you to share Our content with your friends and networks. They are capable of tracking your browser across other sites. This may impact the content and messages you see on other websites you visit (e.g. these cookies can help the social media services up a profile of your interests).

Advertising and Remarketing

We and our advertising partners may collect information using cookies to help make the advertising you see on the Sites and elsewhere on the internet more relevant to you, and to measure the effectiveness of the advertising on the Sites (e.g. these cookies can help Us and our advertising partners show you useful and relevant ads more effectively).
